# Feather Fall (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Feather Fall (Su):* As an immediate action, the ninja can slow her descent as if using *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*. This ability uses her ninja level as the caster level. Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 15
